languages.text: {n}После короткой заминки Арджента добавляет с некоторой заносчивой торопливостью:{/n} "Мой же Орден тем более славен боевым мастерством его сестер. Мы храним имперские святыни! Что стало бы с наследием наших благословенных героев, не умей сестры Пронатус защитить его?"

traits.locale_text: {n}После короткой заминки Арджента добавляет с некоторой заносчивой торопливостью:{/n} "Мой же Орден тем более славен боевым мастерством его сестер. Мы храним имперские святыни! Что стало бы с наследием наших благословенных героев, не умей сестры Пронатус защитить его?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"
languages.original_text: {n}После короткой заминки Арджента добавляет с некоторой заносчивой торопливостью:{/n} "Мой же Орден тем более славен боевым мастерством его сестер. Мы храним имперские святыни! Что стало бы с наследием наших благословенных героев, не умей сестры Пронатус защитить его?"

We are the keepers of Imperial relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus couldn't protect it?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

We are the keepers of Imperial relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus couldn't protect it?"

We are the keepers of Imperial relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

We are the keepers of Imperial relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔顿了顿，声音中带着些许傲慢，急匆匆地补充道。{/n}“至于我所在的修会，更是以修女高超的武艺而闻名。我们可是帝国圣物的守护者！如果连普罗图斯修女都无法守护这些圣物，那些受祝福的英雄遗物会变成什么样子？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔顿了顿，声音中带着些许傲慢，急匆匆地补充道。{/n}“至于我所在的修会，更是以修女高超的武艺而闻名。我们可是帝国圣物的守护者！如果连普罗图斯修女都无法守护这些圣物，那些受祝福的英雄遗物会变成什么样子？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

languages.text: {n}Tras una breve pausa, Argenta añade con cierta arrogancia:{/n} «Además, mi orden tiene motivos de sobra para destacar por la maestría marcial de sus integrantes. ¡Somos las protectoras de las reliquias del Imperium! ¿Qué sería del legado de nuestros benditos héroes si las hermanas Pronatus fueran incapaces de protegerlo?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una breve pausa, Argenta añade con cierta arrogancia:{/n} «Además, mi orden tiene motivos de sobra para destacar por la maestría marcial de sus integrantes. ¡Somos las protectoras de las reliquias del Imperium! ¿Qué sería del legado de nuestros benditos héroes si las hermanas Pronatus fueran incapaces de protegerlo?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}少し間を置いてから、アルジェンタはやや傲慢な態度でこう付け加えた。{/n}「そして、我が修道会は、そのシスターの武勇で知られるだけの理由がある。我々は帝国の遺物を守る者なのだ！もし考古修道会が守れなかったら、祝福された英雄たちの遺産はどうなってしまう？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}少し間を置いてから、アルジェンタはやや傲慢な態度でこう付け加えた。{/n}「そして、我が修道会は、そのシスターの武勇で知られるだけの理由がある。我々は帝国の遺物を守る者なのだ！もし考古修道会が守れなかったら、祝福された英雄たちの遺産はどうなってしまう？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fügt Argenta mit etwas arroganter Hast hinzu:{/n} "Und dann wird mein Orden umso mehr für die Kampfstärke seiner Schwestern bekannt sein. Wir sind die Hüterinnen der imperialen Relikte! Was würde aus dem Vermächtnis unserer gesegneten Helden werden, wenn die Pronatus es nicht beschützen könnten?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fügt Argenta mit etwas arroganter Hast hinzu:{/n} "Und dann wird mein Orden umso mehr für die Kampfstärke seiner Schwestern bekannt sein. Wir sind die Hüterinnen der imperialen Relikte! Was würde aus dem Vermächtnis unserer gesegneten Helden werden, wenn die Pronatus es nicht beschützen könnten?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après une courte pause, Argenta reprend avec une pointe d'arrogance :{/n} « Et mon ordre a toutes les raisons d'être réputé pour les prouesses martiales de ses sœurs. Nous sommes les gardiennes des reliques de l'Imperium ! Que deviendrait l'héritage de nos héros sacrés si les Sœurs Pronatus ne se chargeaient pas de le protéger ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une courte pause, Argenta reprend avec une pointe d'arrogance :{/n} « Et mon ordre a toutes les raisons d'être réputé pour les prouesses martiales de ses sœurs. Nous sommes les gardiennes des reliques impériales ! Que deviendrait l'héritage de nos héros sacrés si les Sœurs Pronatus ne se chargeaient pas le protéger ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir duraksamanın ardından Argenta, hadsizce bir aceleyle ekliyor.{/n} "Mensubu olduğum düzenin rahibeleri, askerî hünerleriyle daha da öne çıkar. Bizler, İmparatorluk yadigârlarının müdafileriyiz! Biz olmasak kutlu kahramanlarımızın mirasını kim koruyacak?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a short pause, Argenta adds with somewhat arrogant haste,{/n} "And my order has all the more reason to be known for the martial prowess of its sisters. We are the keepers of the Imperium's relics! What would become of our blessed heroes' legacy if the Sisters Pronatus could not protect it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir duraksamanın ardından Argenta, hadsizce bir aceleyle ekliyor:{/n} "Mensubu olduğum düzenin rahibeleri, askerî hünerleriyle daha da öne çıkar. İmparatorluk yadigârlarının müdafileriyiz biz! Biz olmasak kutlu kahramanlarımızın mirasını kim koruyacak?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
